statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, category FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT SUM(amount) FROM financial_data WHERE category = 'Food'
SELECT id, date, amount, category FROM financial_data ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31'
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 100 AND category = 'Groceries';
SELECT id, amount FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_data GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE category IN ('Utilities', 'Rent') ORDER BY date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM financial_data WHERE date = '2021-10-15' GROUP BY category HAVING transaction_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM Financial_Data WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT id, transaction_date, amount FROM Financial_Data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM Trends_Analysis WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM Financial_Data WHERE account_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Financial_Data WHERE category = 'Income' AND amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT id, transaction_date, amount FROM Financial_Data WHERE category = 'Shopping' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Trends_Analysis WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM Financial_Data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT id, amount FROM Financial_Data WHERE amount > 1000 AND account_id = 5;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM Trends_Analysis WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-12-31' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT id, amount, date FROM financial_data;
SELECT id, trend_name FROM trends_analysis;
SELECT * FROM patterns_detection WHERE pattern_type = 'Type1';
SELECT id, pattern_name, pattern_type FROM patterns_detection ORDER BY pattern_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends_analysis WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(trend_description) > 50
SELECT id, pattern_name, pattern_type FROM patterns_detection WHERE pattern_type = 'geometric' ORDER BY pattern_name
SELECT id, date FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM trends_analysis WHERE trend_name LIKE 'pattern%'
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM financial_data WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 10000;
SELECT transaction_type, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT account_name, transaction_type, amount FROM accounts JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id WHERE account_name LIKE '%Savings%';
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT category, amount FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT date, category, amount FROM financial_data WHERE category = 'Food';
SELECT date, category, amount FROM financial_data WHERE amount <= 500 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT category, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM financial_data GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_data GROUP BY category HAVING total_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE category = 'Expenses' AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY category, amount ASC
SELECT category, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM financial_data GROUP BY category ORDER BY average_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
